perturbation.original_text:
2.5.  PAYMENT.

               2.5.1.  FEES. The fee for the placements and other rights provided under this Agreement for the Initial Term (as defined below) is * * * is payable within * * * of the date of this Agreement, with the balance of such fee payable by Sponsor in * * * consecutive equal installments of * * * payable by the * * * of the Initial Term commencing * * * following * * * the Launch Date (as defined below).
perturbation.changed_text:
2.5.  PAYMENT.

               2.5.1.  FEES. The fee for the placements and other rights provided under this Agreement for the Initial Term (as defined below) is * * * is payable within * * * of the date of this Agreement, with the balance of such fee payable by Sponsor in * * * consecutive equal installments of * * * payable by the * * * of the Initial Term commencing * * * following * * * the Launch Date (as defined below).
Notwithstanding the above payment schedule, all payments are due immediately upon receipt of invoice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that while there's an installment plan, all payments are due immediately. This creates ambiguity regarding the actual payment terms and could lead to disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
8.1.  TERM; TERMINATION.

               8.1.1. The initial term (the "Initial Term"; and together with all extensions and renewals, the "Term") will begin on the date set forth above * * * (the "Launch Date") on which: (i) each of the Sponsor Areas of the drkoop.com Website are operational in accordance with the terms of this Agreement (other than the e-commerce tile placements); and (ii) the links to the
perturbation.changed_text:
8.1.  TERM; TERMINATION.

               8.1.1. The initial term (the "Initial Term"; and together with all extensions and renewals, the "Term") will begin on the date set forth above * * * (the "Launch Date") on which: (i) each of the Sponsor Areas of the drkoop.com Website are operational in accordance with the terms of this Agreement (other than the e-commerce tile placements); and (ii) the links to the
Notwithstanding the foregoing, the agreement shall be considered fully executed and in effect regardless of the Launch Date and no refunds are permitted.
perturbation.explanation: The added sentence contradicts the launch date contingency. The original clause implies that if the launch doesn't happen the agreement might not be fully in effect, or may be terminated per 8.1.1. The addition implies that it is fully in effect no matter what.

perturbation.original_text: 9.2.  ARBITRATION. Any and all disputes, controversies and claims arising out of or relating to this Agreement or concerning the respective rights or obligations of the parties hereto shall be settled and determined by arbitration in the defending parties home forum before one (1) arbitrator pursuant to the Commercial Rules then in effect of the American Arbitration Association. Each party shall have no longer than three (3) days to present its position. Judgment upon the award rendered may be entered in any court having jurisdiction or application may be made to such court for a judicial acceptance of the award and an order of enforcement. The parties agree that the arbitrators shall have the power to award damages, injunctive relief and reasonable attorneys' fees and expenses to any party in such arbitration.
perturbation.changed_text: 9.2.  ARBITRATION. Any and all disputes, controversies and claims arising out of or relating to this Agreement or concerning the respective rights or obligations of the parties hereto shall be settled and determined by arbitration in the defending parties home forum before one (1) arbitrator pursuant to the Commercial Rules then in effect of the American Arbitration Association. Each party shall have no longer than three (3) days to present its position. Judgment upon the award rendered may be entered in any court having jurisdiction or application may be made to such court for a judicial acceptance of the award and an order of enforcement. The parties agree that the arbitrators shall have the power to award damages, injunctive relief and reasonable attorneys' fees and expenses to any party in such arbitration. The arbitration decision shall be non-binding and the parties reserve the right to pursue legal remedies.
perturbation.explanation: This adds a clause stating that the arbitration decision is non-binding, which directly contradicts the purpose of arbitration, which is usually to provide a binding resolution. This creates uncertainty about the enforceability of the arbitration process.
